### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Views are created from source code()
- [ ] Views are places in separate files(not in ViewControllers etc.)
- [ ] Views are using elements available in CommonUI framework
- [ ] Code is documented
- [ ] Changes are testable in Demo Application
